dialog: Jyn, gather your things. It's time.
It's happened. He's come for us.
Remember, whatever I do, I do it to protect you.
You know where to go, don't you?
You're a hard man to find, Galen.
I need you to come back.
We were on the verge of greatness.
We were this close to providing peace and security for the galaxy.
Well, you have to start somewhere.
I'd be of no help, Krennic.
My mind just isn't what it was.
You're an inspired scientist, but you're a terrible liar.
Oh, look, here's Lyra, back from the dead.
No, of course I'm not. I'm taking you all.
You'll all come. You, your child.
We have a long ride ahead of us.
I came as fast as I could.
I have to get back on board. Walk with me.
Easy! You have news from Jedha.
An Imperial pilot, one of the cargo drivers he defected yesterday.
He's telling people they're making a weapon.
The kyber crystals, that's what they're for.
A planet killer! That's what he called it!
They were looking for Saw when we left.
Come on, let's see some scandocs.
Yeah, of course. Just... My gloves.
I'll never climb out of here. My arm!
He looks kind of different to how I imagined.
Okay, we're just wasting time that we don't have.
I need to speak to Saw Gerrera.
We're out here in the middle of nowhere.
We need to get to Jedha City.
What part of "urgent message" do you guys not understand?
We are all on the same side.
If you just see past the uniform for a minute.
I don't know. Must be another pickup.
You wanna get out of here?
Give me the keys! Give me the keys!
You're currently calling yourself Liana Hallik.
Imagine if the Imperial authorities had found out...
who you really were, Jyn Erso.
That is your given name, is it not?
Jyn Erso, daughter of Galen Erso?
A known Imperial collaborator in weapons development.
It's a chance for you to make a fresh start.
We think you might be able to help us.
This is Captain Cassian Andor, Rebel Intelligence.
When was the last time you were in contact with your father?
Any idea where he's been all that time?
I like to think he's dead.
Easier than what? That he's been a tool of the Imperial war machine?
I've never had the luxury of political opinions.
When was your last contact with Saw Gerrera?
He might agree to meet you, if you came as a friend.
We're up against the clock here, girl, so if there's nothing to talk about, we'll just put you back where we found you.
Saw Gerrera saved my life. He raised me.
But I have no idea where he is.
I haven't seen him in years.
We know how to find him.
What we need is someone who gets us through the door without being killed.
Yes, but Saw Gerrera is an extremist.
He's been fighting on his own since he broke with the Rebellion.
His militancy has caused the Alliance a great many problems.
We have no choice now but to try and mend that broken trust.
What does this have to do with my father?
There's an Imperial defector in Jedha. A pilot.
He's been held by Saw Gerrera.
He's claiming the Emperor is creating a weapon with the power to destroy entire planets.
The pilot says he was sent by your father.
We need to stop this weapon before it is finished.
Captain Andor's mission is to authenticate the pilot's story.
And then, if possible, find your father.
It appears he is critical to the development of this super weapon.
Given the gravity of the situation and your history with Saw, we're hoping that he will help us locate your father and return him to the Senate for testimony.
We'll make sure you go free.
I see the Council is sending you with us to Jedha.
That is a bad idea. I think so, and so does Cassian.
My specialty is just strategic analysis.
Galen Erso is vital to the Empire's weapons program.
Forget what you heard in there.
Prepare for takeoff while we check your authorization.
He tends to say whatever comes into his circuits.
It's a byproduct of the reprogram.
Why does she get a blaster and I don't?
I know how to use it.
That's what I'm afraid of. Give it to me.
That's not the point. Where'd you get it?
I find that answer vague and unconvincing.
Would you like to know the probability of her using it against you?
"Bodhi Rook. Cargo pilot."  Local boy, huh?
He didn't capture me. I came here myself. I defected.
Lies? Would I risk everything for a lie?
No, we don't have time for this.
I have to speak to Saw Gerrera before it's too late.
And I gave it to them.
He told me to find you.
He told me to find you.
Most unfortunate about the security breach on Jedha, Director Krennic.
After so many setbacks and delays, and now this.
We've heard word of rumors circulating through the city.
Apparently, you've lost a rather talkative cargo pilot.
If the Senate gets wind of our project, countless systems will flock to the Rebellion.
When the battle station is finished, Governor Tarkin...
the Senate will be of little concern.
When has become now, Director Krennic.
The Emperor will tolerate no further delay.
You have made time an ally of the Rebellion.
I suggest we solve both problems simultaneously...
with an immediate test of the weapon.
Failure will find you explaining why to a far less patient audience.
We find Saw, we find your father.
It's because of your old friend, Saw Gerrera.
He's been attacking the cargo shipments.
It's what are they taking out.
Kyber crystal. All they can get.
We wondered why they were stripping the temple.
It's the fuel for the weapon.
Maybe we should leave target practice behind.
She's right. We need to blend in.
I can blend in. I'm an Imperial droid.
The city is under Imperial occupation.
Half the people here wanna reprogram you.
The other half wanna put a hole in your head.
I'm surprised you're so concerned with my safety.
I'm just worried they might miss you and hit me.
Doesn't sound so bad to me.
Bor Gullet can feel your thoughts.
What have you really brought me, cargo pilot?
Bor Gullet will know the truth.
The unfortunate side effect is that one tends...
We don't want any trouble. Sorry.
You must come forward with information of the location of this missing cargo pilot.
A reward of 600 credits for the information shall be awarded.
His sister will be looking for him.
The temple's been destroyed, but she'll be there waiting.
We'll give her your name and hope that gets us a meeting with Saw.
Yeah. Rebellions are built on hope.
Hands where I can see them.
Show me some identification. Check inside.
Is this all because of your pilot?
May the Force of others be with you.
May the Force of others be with you.
May the Force of others be with you.
Would you trade that necklace for a glimpse into your future?
How did you know I was wearing a necklace?
For that answer, you must pay.
What do you know about kyber crystals?
He said they powered the Jedi's lightsabers.
The strongest stars have hearts of kyber.
We're not here to make friends.
But there's nothing left to protect.
So now they're just causing trouble for everybody.
You seem awfully tense all of a sudden.
This town is ready to blow.
Imperial forces tirelessly fight Saw Gerrera's reign of terror...
over the people of this beloved city.
Truth and justice are the tools of the Empire.
Tell me you have a backup plan.
Looks like we found Saw's rebels.
Did you know that wasn't me?
I thought I told you to stay on the ship.
You did. But I thought it was boring, and you were in trouble.
There were a lot of explosions...
I should just wait on the ship.
Where are you taking these prisoners?
Yes. Where are you taking them?
I am taking them to imprison them in prison.
And there's a fresh one if you mouth off again.
If you could just point me in the right direction, I can take them, I'm sure.
We need to check your diagnostics.
I'm capable of running my own diagnostics, thank you very much.
And I am with the Force.
For all is as the Force wills it.
Cassian, I'm sorry about the slap.
Go back to the ship. Wait for my call.
There are no Jedi here anymore.
Can you get us to Saw Gerrera?
We are no friends of the Empire.
Anyone who kills me or my friends will answer to Saw Gerrera.
Because I'm the daughter of Galen Erso.
Are you kidding me? I'm blind.
I'm one with the Force, the Force is with me.
I'm one with the Force, the Force is with me.
I'm one with the Force, the Force is with me.
I'm one with the Force, the Force is with me.
He's praying for the door to open.
It bothers him because he knows it's possible.
Baze Malbus was once the most devoted Guardian of us all.
I'm beginning to think the Force and I have different priorities.
We've been in worse cages than this one.
This is the first for me.
There is more than one sort of prison, Captain.
I sense that you carry yours wherever you go.
The last time I saw you, you gave me a knife and loaded blaster...
and told me to wait in a bunker till daylight.
You were already the best soldier in my cadre.
You were the daughter of an Imperial science officer.
People were starting to figure that out.
People who wanted to use you as a hostage.
that I don't think of you.
There's not much of me left.
They think he sent you a message about a weapon.
I guess they think by sending me, you might actually help them out.
So what is it that you want, Jyn?
They wanted an introduction, they've got it.
Rest of you can do what you want.
You care not about the cause?
the rebels, whatever it is you're calling yourself these days...
all it's ever brought me is pain.
You can stand to see the Imperial flag reign across the galaxy?
It's not a problem if you don't look up.
I have something to show you.
The Emperor is awaiting my report.
One would hope that he and Lord Vader might've been here for such an occasion.
And I thought it prudent to save you from any potential embarrassment.
If saying it would only make it so.
All Imperial forces have been evacuated...
and I stand ready to destroy the entire moon.
We need a statement, not a manifesto.
The Holy City will be enough for today.
Who's the one in the next cell?
Hey. Hey. Are you the pilot?
I brought the message. I'm the pilot.
This is the message I was sent.
Saw, if you are watching this...
then perhaps there's a chance to save the Alliance.
Perhaps there's a chance to explain myself...
and, though I don't dare hope for too much...
a chance for Jyn, if she's alive...
if you can possibly find her...
to let her know that my love for her has never faded...
and how desperately I've missed her.
I can't imagine what you think of me.
When I was taken, I faced some bitter truths.
I was told that soon enough Krennic would have you as well.
I knew that you were either dead...
or so well hidden that he would never find you.
I knew if I had refused to work, if I took my own life...
it would only be a matter of time before Krennic realized...
he no longer needed me to complete the project.
So I did the one thing nobody expected.
I played the part of a beaten man resigned to the sanctuary of his work.
and all the while, I laid the groundwork of my revenge.
We call it the Death Star.
and the day is coming soon when it will be unleashed.
I've placed a weakness deep within the system...
a flaw so small and powerful, they will never find it.
Jyn, if you're listening, my beloved...
so much of my life has been wasted.
I try to think of you only in the moments when I'm strong...
because the pain of not having you with me...
The pain of that loss is so overwhelming...
It's just so hard not to think of you.
the reactor module, that's the key.
That's the place I've laid my trap.
One blast to any part of it will destroy the entire station.
the structural plans for the Death Star, to find the reactor.
I know there's a complete engineering archive...
in the data vault at the Citadel Tower on Scarif.
Any pressurized explosion to the reactor module...
will set off a chain reaction that will destroy the entire station.
I'm standing by as you requested...
although there's a problem on the horizon.
Bring that ship in here, now!
Get the pilot, we need him!
I know where your father is.
I'm not very optimistic about our odds.
I believe I owe you an apology, Director Krennic.
And you'll tell the Emperor as much?
I will tell him that his patience with your misadventures...
has been rewarded with a weapon that will bring a swift end to the Rebellion.
And that that was only an inkling of its destructive potential.
I will tell him that I will be taking control over the weapon...
I first spoke of years ago effective immediately.
We stand here amidst my achievement.
I'm afraid the recent security breaches...
have laid bare your inadequacies as a military director.
You think this pilot acted alone?
He was dispatched from the installation on Eadu...
A coded message from Captain Andor, sir.
"Weapon confirmed." "Jedha destroyed." "Mission target located on Eadu, please advise." Destroyed?
Tell him my orders still stand.
Tell him to proceed with haste...
We have no idea what he's building for the Empire.
We have to kill Galen Erso while we have the chance.
Is that where my father is?
he said I could get right by myself.
He said I could make it right...
to listen to what was in my heart.
We can beat the people who did this.
My father's message, I've seen it.
They call it the Death Star.
there's a way to defeat it.
Because he knew they'd do it without him.
He sacrificed himself for the Rebellion.
He's rigged a trap inside it.
That's why he sent you, to bring that message.
I'm not the one you've got to convince.
You said your father made a trap.
The reactor. He's placed a weakness there.
He's been hiding it for years.
He said if you can blow the reactor, the module, the whole system goes down.
You need to send word to the Alliance.
They have to know there's a way to destroy this thing.
They have to go to Scarif to get the plans.
We're in the heart of Imperial territory.
Then we'll find him and bring him back.
And he can tell them himself.
I'm one with the Force, the Force is with me.
Are you sure this is the way?
You've got to stay in the canyon. Keep it low.
I don't know, I'm not sure.
I never really come this way.
But we're close, we're close. I know that.
Now, there's a 35% chance of failure.
I don't wanna know. Thank you!
If you keep going, you'll be right over the shuttle depot.
That's a shuttle depot straight ahead of us.
We'll have to hope there's still an Imperial ship left to steal.
Hopefully the storm keeps up and keeps us hidden down here.
We'll go up the ridge and check it out.
We can't risk it. You're the messenger.
That's ridiculous, we all got the message.
"One blast to the reactor module and the whole system goes down." That's how you said it, "The whole system goes down." Get to work fixing our comms.
All I want to do right now is get a handle on what we're up against.
So we're gonna go very small and very careful up the rise...
Does he look like a killer?
No. He has the face of a friend.
What do you mean, "Does he look like a killer?" The Force moves darkly near a creature that's about to kill.
His weapon was in the sniper configuration.
No, no, no. We've got to go up.
You can't see much from down there.
I don't need luck. I have you!
If Cassian comes back, we're leaving without them.
That's him. Galen, in the dark suit.
Get back down there and find us a ride outta here.
You said we came up here just to have a look.
Proud as I can be, Krennic.
One of you has conspired with a pilot...
to send messages to the Rebellion.
I'll consider it a group effort then.
They have nothing to do with it.
How do I know the weapon is complete?
Let me share with you some details.
I'm here. You've got it working?
There's an Alliance squadron approaching. Clear the area.
No, no, no, no! Tell them to hold off!
Saw Gerrera. His band of fanatics...
the last reminder of the Jedi, gone.
Now where have I heard that before?
Captain Andor requesting a delay on squadron support.
Alliance forces on site. Please confirm.
Get our fighters in the air now!
I have so much to tell you.
Jyn, we gotta go. Come on.
Nothing you can do. Come on.
Come on, let's get out of here!
Ion thrusters low until we've cleared the storm.
You went up there to kill my father.
You don't know what you're talking about.
You're in shock and looking for some place to put it.
You lied about why we came here and you lied about why you went up alone.
I had every chance to pull the trigger...
and you put him at risk.
Those were Alliance bombs that killed him.
You might as well be a Stormtrooper.
We don't all have the luxury of deciding...
when and where we want to care about something.
Suddenly the Rebellion is real for you.
I've been in this fight since I was 6 years old.
You're not the only one who lost everything.
Some of us just decided to do something about it.
You can't talk your way around this.
Make sure they know we're coming in with a stolen ship.
There's a great many things to attend to.
You do have a great many things to explain.
I delivered the weapon the Emperor requested.
to make certain that he understands its remarkable...
Its power to create problems has certainly been confirmed.
It was Governor Tarkin that suggested the test.
You were not summoned here to grovel, Director Krennic.
that Jedha was destroyed in a mining disaster.
I expect you not to rest until you can assure the Emperor...
that Galen Erso has not compromised this weapon in any way.
You'll speak to the Emperor about...
Be careful not to choke on your aspirations, Director.
We have no recourse but to surrender.
Are we really talking about disbanding something...
that we've worked so hard to create?
We joined an alliance, not a suicide pact.
We've only now managed to gather our forces.
General Draven's already blown up an Imperial base.
A decision needed to be made!
If that's how it's going, why have an alliance at all?
If she's telling the truth, we need to act now!
The Empire has the means of mass destruction...
A Death Star. This is nonsense.
What reason would my father have to lie?
What benefit would it bring him?
To lure our forces into a final battle to destroy us once and for all.
The dying words of her father, an Imperial scientist?
But don't forget the Imperial pilot.
My father gave his life so that we may have a chance to defeat this.
If the Empire has this kind of power, what chance do we have?
The question is "what choice." Run, hide...
plead for mercy, scatter your forces.
You give way to an enemy this evil with this much power...
and you condemn the galaxy to an eternity of submission.
The time to fight is now!
Every moment you waste is another step closer to the ashes of Jedha.
Send your best troops to Scarif.
Send the rebel fleet if you have to.
You need to capture the Death Star plans if there's any hope of destroying it.
You're asking us to invade an Imperial installation...
I say the Rebellion is finished!
Without the full support of the Council...
General Syndulla, please report to the briefing room.
So do I. We all do.
I'm not sure four of us is quite enough.
They were never gonna believe you.
we've all done terrible things on behalf of the Rebellion.
Everything I did, I did for the Rebellion.
And every time I walked away...
from something I wanted to forget...
I told myself it was for a cause that I believed in.
A cause that was worth it.
Everything we've done would have been for nothing.
I couldn't face myself if I gave up now.
It'd be a bit cramped, but we'd all fit.
Grab anything that's not nailed down.
I'm not used to people sticking around when things go bad.
May the Force be with us.
No one's supposed to be on board until further instructions.
Despite what the others say, war is inevitable.
I must return to Alderaan to inform my people that there will be no peace.
He served me well during the Clone Wars...
and has lived in hiding since the Emperor's purge.
Yes, I will send for him.
You will need someone you can trust.
I would trust her with my life.
I have a mission for you, sir.
with a single main entry gate.
This shuttle should be equipped with an access code that allows us through.
Assuming the Empire hasn't logged it as overdue.
And we're all annihilated in the cold, dark vacuum of space.
Cargo shuttle SW0608 requesting a landing pad.
Cargo shuttle SW0608, you're not listed on the arrival schedule.
We were rerouted from Eadu flight station.
Tractor beam test in bays 2 through 8.
Tractor beam test in bays 2 through 8.
SW0608 proceeding to LP 9 as instructed.
Main building down there, what is it?
They keep all the Imperial structural archives up there.
If the plans are anywhere, they'll be there.
And the dish at the top, what's it for?
I guess it takes a lot of signal to send those data files out.
one fighter with a sharp stick and nothing left to lose can take the day.
They've no reason to expect us.
If we can make it to the ground, we'll take the next chance.
And the next. On and on until we win...
The Death Star plans are down there.
Cassian, K2, and I will find them.
We'll find a way to find them.
Move east and get wide of the ship.
Find a position between here and the tower.
Once you get to the best spot...
And get those troopers away from us.
You're our only way outta here.
be prepared to receive inspection team.
Oh, you're probably looking for a manifest?
Director Krennic, we are entering the Scarif shield gate.
General Ramda has been informed of your arrival.
All right, let's go! Come on.
I've got a bad feeling about...
Well, I'm sure there's one just lying about.
You know what you have to do.
Pick your spot. We wanna draw them out.
Hey, did you hear the rumors?
Yeah, the T15s have been marked obsolete.
Oh boy, it's about time for that.
Director, what brings you to Scarif?
I want every dispatch, every transmission he has ever sent...
Our optimal route to the data vault places only 89 Stormtroopers in our path.
We will make it no more than 33% of the way before we are killed.
I want to speak with Director Krennic.
The original plans for this station are kept there, are they not?
Prepare for the jump to hyperspace and inform Lord Vader.
I need to speak with Admiral Raddus.
Attention, all flight personnel, please report to your commanders immediately.
All flight personnel, please report to your commanders immediately.
We have been redirected to Scarif.
Pilots, you'll be briefed by your squadron leaders en route.
May the Force be with you.
Why does nobody ever tell me anything, R2?
Coming in on our flank. We need numbers.
Pad 14, what's going on down there?
Oh, no. We have rebels everywhere!
I spot 40 rebels heading west on Pad 2.
Get on there. Tell him you're pinned down by rebels on Pad 5.
Get reinforcements down to Pad 5 immediately!
This is Admiral Raddus of the Rebel Alliance.
Admiral, this is Blue Leader standing by.
This is Gold Leader standing by.
This is Red Leader standing by.
Director, the rebel fleet, it's amassing outside the shield.
Lock down the base. Lock it down.
Red and Gold Squadrons, attack formations.
Blue Squadron, get to the surface before they close that gate.
Close the field aperture now! Close it!
Come on, come on, come on!
We could transmit the plans to the rebel fleet.
We'd have to get a signal up to tell them it's coming.
It's the size of the data files.
Someone has to take that shield gate down.
Bodhi. Bodhi, can you hear me?
Bodhi, tell me you're out there.
The rebel fleet is up there.
You've gotta tell them to blow a hole in the shield gate...
so we can transmit the plans.
Wait. I can't. I'm not hooked into the comms tower.
It's the only way we're getting them out of here.
Your behavior, Jyn Erso, is continually unexpected.
Get ready. We're gonna have to go out there.
But the rebel fleet are pulling in.
We just have to get a signal strong enough to get through to them...
and let them know that we're trapped down here.
For that, we have to connect to the communications tower.
Now, I can patch us in over here, the landing pad.
But you have to get on the radio.
Get one of the guys out there to find a master switch.
Get them to activate the connection between us and that comms tower.
What's going on down there, Lieutenant?
Keep trying. Engage those Star Destroyers and let's start probing that shield!
I can locate the tape, but you'll need to use the handles for extraction.
What am I supposed to do with this?
The rebels, they went over there.
K, what's going on out there?
Red Leader, this is Gold Leader.
We're starting our attack run on the shield gate.
Keep it tight, and watch out for those towers.
More fighters. Form out at sixfive.
Melshi! Melshi, come in. Are you there?
Bodhi sent a signal from here.
But you guys have to open up a line for the tower.
There's a master switch at the base of the comm tower.
The master switch? Where is it?
Uwings, reinforce those troops on the beach.
We have to shield them from air attack.
We're having no effect on that shield.
How much more can that thing take?
This is Red Five! I need help!
I've got one on my tail!
Project code names: "Stellarsphere, Mark Omega, Pax Aurora." "WarMantle, Cluster Prism, Blacksaber." What?
K, we need the file for Stardust.
You can still send the plans to the fleet.
If they open the shield gate...
you can broadcast from the tower.
Sir, unauthorized access at the data vault.
Send my guard squadron into battle.
I can't get to the shuttle.
You have to. They have to hit that gate.
If the shield's open, we can send the plans.
I'm tied in at my end.
I just need an open line.
I'm one with the Force, the Force is with me.
I'm one with the Force and the Force is with me.
I'm one with the Force, the Force is with me.
and the Force is with me.
I'm one with the Force, and the Force is with me.
It's okay. Look for the Force.
And you will always find me.
The Force is with me and I'm one with the Force.
The Force is with me and I'm one with the Force.
The Force is with me and I'm one with the Force.
We have to press the attack!
This is Rogue One calling any Alliance ships that can hear me.
This is Admiral Raddus, Rogue One. We hear you.
They found the Death Star plans.
They have to transmit them from the communications tower.
You have to take down the shield gate.
It's the only way they're gonna get them through.
Stand by, Rogue One. We're on it.
The Force is with me, and I'm one with the Force.
He built a flaw in the Death Star.
He put a fuse in the middle of your machine...
and I've just told the entire galaxy how to light it.
Your signal will never reach the rebel base.
All your ships in the air will be destroyed.
Sir, we're detecting a massive object emerging from hyperspace.
Sir, shall I begin targeting their fleet?
Lord Vader will handle the fleet.
Target the base at Scarif, single reactor ignition.
Rogue One, may the Force be with you.
All ships prepare for jump to hyperspace.
Your father would have been proud of you, Jyn.
The rebel flagship is disabled, my lord...
but has received transmissions from the surface.
Let's go! We gotta go, now!
Make sure you secure the airlock.
What is it they've sent us?
